requestParams.name: page_size
requestParams.desc: 每页记录数，最大不超过100，建议使用默认值20

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['page_no']=1
params['page_size']=15

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.salesman.accounts.get', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)
